item.title: I think something is wrong?
item.dc:creator: @billcosby41 billcosby41
item.description:
@billcosby41 wrote:

Ok so my server is up. Me and my other owner are playing it from the same ip. But on my run.bat, i get some other ip’s, saying that people tried to play my server, but it says: Connection from: (ip here) ClientHandler: Client null disconnected. My client.java in my source folder is at my ip (gergscape.no-ip.org) but here is what it looks like: if (Server.equals("gergscape.no-ip.org") || Server.equals("localhost")) { return 1;
Im guessing its because its at localhost. What do i change localhost to?

Read full topic
